name: Web Application Firewall Detector
short_description: Typical Web Firewalls use a mechanism to classify anomaly traffics. This tool  submits an old-school malicious (not dangerous) request,  and tells you the type of firewall a particular web site use (if any). Mainly useful for blackbox security assessment
